mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VENUE ( venue_name, description, contact, email_id, street, area, city, region, country, pin, is_available, gallery_path, from_date, to_date, is_stall, available_stalls) VALUES(#{venueName}, #{description},#{contact},#{emailId}, #{street},#{area},#{city},#{region},#{country},#{pin},#{isAvailable},#{galleryPath},#{fromDate},#{toDate},#{isStall},#{availableStalls})
mapper.update: UPDATE VENUE SET VENUE_NAME = #{venueName}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, CONTACT = #{contact}, EMAIL_ID = #{emailId}, STREET = #{street}, AREA = #{area}, CITY = #{city}, REGION = #{region}, COUNTRY = #{country}, PIN = #{pin}, IS_AVAILABLE = #{isAvailable}, GALLERY_PATH = #{galleryPath}, FROM_DATE = #{fromDate}, TO_DATE = #{toDate}, IS_STALL = #{isStall}, AVAILABLE_STALLS = #{availableStalls} WHERE VENUE_ID = #{venueId}
